mapper.insert: insert into notice_tb (title, content, category_id) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select *, nc.name as name from notice_tb as n inner join notice_category_tb as nc on nc.id = n.category_id
select * from notice_tb as n inner join notice_category_tb as nc on nc.id = n.category_id where title like #{keyword}
select * from notice_tb as n inner join notice_category_tb as nc on nc.id = n.category_id where n.id=#{id}

select.if: select * from notice_tb as n inner join notice_category_tb as nc on nc.id = n.category_id
select * from notice_tb as n inner join notice_category_tb as nc on nc.id = n.category_id where nc.id=#{categoryId}
